tasks.label: Check DB Functions
tasks.command: echo "Run this script with your Supabase credentials:" && echo "PowerShell: .\check_fix_functions.ps1 -ApiKey \"your_service_key\" -ApiUrl \"https://your-project-ref.supabase.co\"" && echo "Bash: ./check_fix_functions.sh -k \"your_service_key\" -u \"https://your-project-ref.supabase.co\""
